en: Mr. Zebra, the postman,is delivering a parcel to Peppa's house.
zh: 邮递员斑马先生正在给佩奇家送包裹。

en: Look! I just got a parcel in the post!
zh: 瞧！我刚收到一个邮差送来的包裹！
有谁可以猜到里面是什么？

en: Oh, George! You always say ''dinosaur'' for everything!
zh: 哦，乔治！你总是将所有的东西都说是“恐龙”！

en: The parcel is far too small to have a dinosaur inside!
zh: 这包裹这么小恐龙怎么可能在里面！

en: Hmmm... I think it's a new toy!
zh: 嗯。。。我想它是一个新玩具！

en: A new toy for Daddy Pig!
We can make movies with it and watch them on our television!
zh: 我们可以用它来拍影片然后在电视里看！

en: Can I use it first, Daddy?
zh: 我可以第一个用吗，爸爸？

en: It's a bit too difficult for children to use.
zh: 对孩子来说，用起来有点困难哦。

en: Even I need to read the instructions!
zh: 就算是我，也需要看说明书！

en: Hmmm. It's a bit harder than I thought.
zh: 嗯。它比我想的要难一点。

en: Suzy Sheep's mummy has a movie camera.
zh: 苏西的妈妈就有一台摄像机。

en: She switches it on like this.
Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000!
I am eager and ready to shoot your first movie.
zh: 我迫不及待想帮您拍第一部影片了.哔-哔-！

en: Is there a way to turn that voice off ?
zh: 有没有方法把这个声音关掉呢？

en: Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000!
On Suzy's camera, you just press this button to stop it talking.
zh: 苏西家的摄像机，你只要按这个按钮，就可以让它停止说话了。

en: Maybe we should film something new!
zh: 也许我们该拍些新东西了！

en: I know! Daddy Pig must leave the room
zh: 我知道！猪爸爸你先离开这房间

en: and we'll make a movie to show him!
zh: 我们会拍段影片给你看！

en: Daddy Pig has to wait in the kitchen while Mummy Pig, Peppa and George make a secret movie!
zh: 当猪妈妈佩奇和乔治拍摄影片的时候猪爸爸得在厨房等。

en: We must all have to do something.
George? Do you want to go first?
Can I come in and see the movie?
zh: 我可以进来看影片了吗？

en: Finished! You can come in now!
zh: 完成了！你现在可以进来了！

en: George has made a movie and so has Peppa!
zh: 乔治拍了一段影片，佩奇也是！
让我们来先看看乔治的影片！

en: George is pretending to be a dinosaur.
zh: 乔治假装自己是一只恐龙。
那的确是一个很吓人的恐龙。

en: that's not a real dinosaur on TV, it's you!
zh: 在电视里的不是真恐龙，是你！
现在，让我们来看看佩奇的影片。

en: Who is that meant to be?
My tummy is very big, because I eat a lot of cookies!
zh: 我的肚子非常大，因为我吃了太多的饼干！
我的肚子一点也不大啊！

en: But it is true that I like cookies.
zh: 不过我喜欢吃饼干是真的。

en: And the more you eat, the bigger your tummy gets!
zh: 而且你越吃越多，你的肚子就越变越大！

en: This is my sweet little brother, George.
zh: 这是我可爱的小弟弟，乔治。

en: And this is the real Daddy Pig.
zh: 而这个就是真正的猪爸爸。
